entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
